name: Christmas Crazy Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Happy Christmas. Let’s have some christmas jigsaw puzzle fun together to spend our crazy holiday.

Jigsaw Puzzles is one of the most popular logical reasoning games in the world. The secret is its attentiveness challenge. Trying to find a matching piece you improve your visual memory and search skills.

Features:
- A super fun Christmas themed jigsaw puzzle games.
- Fix the santa clause and help him to send the presents to the kids.
- Make your own snowman, They will be so happy to be there.
- Decorate your own Christmas Room with so many decorations. You are the best designer.
- Create your own Christmas trees, Oh, you can create two. Wonderful!
- Don’t miss the Christmas feast. Christmas cake, turkey, cupcake, pie, coffee, hot chocolate,candy etc.
- Enjoy your Christmas time with your best friends and family.
